org.imperiumlabs.geofirestore

Class GeoQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.imperiumlabs.geofirestore.GeoQuery

  • public class GeoQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    A GeoQuery object can be used for geo queries in a given circle. The GeoQuery class is thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Returns the radius of the query, in kilometers.
        Returns:
        The radius of this query, in kilometers

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        Sets the radius of this query, in kilometers, and triggers new events if necessary.
        Parameters:
        radius - The radius of the query, in kilometers. The maximum radius that is supported is about 8587km. If a radius bigger than this is passed we'll cap it.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation(com.google.firebase.firestore.GeoPoint center,
                        double radius)
        Sets the center and radius (in kilometers) of this query, and triggers new events if necessary.
        Parameters:
        center - The new center
        radius - The radius of the query, in kilometers. The maximum radius that is supported is about 8587km. If a radius bigger than this is passed we'll cap it.
